attributes.action: Remove Theresa May as prime minister.
attributes.background: Theresa May has completely undermined brexit and has not took the instruction of 17.4 million people to leave the European Union. We the people elected the government on what will be the biggest lie that this government has spun. The people demand a pro brexit prime minister.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or fired.

 If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
